nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member harmonicAnalysis is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often harmonic analysis computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_start_delay
nml_option.description: Number of days after start of simulation when harmonic analysis begins. This is referenced relative to the start of the original simulation, not the restart date.

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_duration
nml_option.description: Length of harmonic analysis period. The analysis begins after config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_start_delay days and ends after config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_start_delay + config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_duration days relative to the start of the original simulation, not the restart date.

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the harmonicAnalysis analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_restart_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the harmonicAnalysis analysis member restart informaion should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_use_M2
nml_option.description: Controls if M2 constituent is used in harmonic analysis

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_use_S2
nml_option.description: Controls if S2 constituent is used in harmonic analysis

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_use_N2
nml_option.description: Controls if N2 constituent is used in harmonic analysis

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_use_K2
nml_option.description: Controls if K2 constituent is used in harmonic analysis

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_use_K1
nml_option.description: Controls if K1 constituent is used in harmonic analysis

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_use_O1
nml_option.description: Controls if O1 constituent is used in harmonic analysis

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_use_Q1
nml_option.description: Controls if Q1 constituent is used in harmonic analysis

nml_option.name: config_AM_harmonicAnalysis_use_P1
nml_option.description: Controls if P1 constituent is used in harmonic analysis

package.name: harmonicAnalysisAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the harmonicAnalysis analysis member.

var.name: nAnalysisConstituents
var.description: Number of tidal constituents used in analysis

var.name: analysisConstituentFrequency
var.description: Frequency of each constituent

var.name: analysisConstituentNodalAmplitude
var.description: Frequency of each constituent

var.name: analysisConstituentNodalPhase
var.description: Frequency of each constituent

var.name: leastSquaresLHSMatrix
var.description: Frequency of each constituent

var.name: leastSquaresRHSVector
var.description: Frequency of each constituent

var.name: decomposedConstituentAmplitude
var.description: Amplitude of each tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: decomposedConstituentPhase
var.description: Phase of each tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: M2Amplitude
var.description: Amplitude of M2 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: M2Phase
var.description: Phase of M2 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: S2Amplitude
var.description: Amplitude of S2 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: S2Phase
var.description: Phase of S2 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: N2Amplitude
var.description: Amplitude of N2 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: N2Phase
var.description: Phase of N2 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: K2Amplitude
var.description: Amplitude of K2 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: K2Phase
var.description: Phase of K2 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: K1Amplitude
var.description: Amplitude of K1 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: K1Phase
var.description: Phase of K1 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: O1Amplitude
var.description: Amplitude of O1 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: O1Phase
var.description: Phase of O1 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: Q1Amplitude
var.description: Amplitude of Q1 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: Q1Phase
var.description: Phase of Q1 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: P1Amplitude
var.description: Amplitude of P1 tidal constituent at each cell center

var.name: P1Phase
var.description: Phase of P1 tidal constituent at each cell center
